title: Looking for players to play norms today
body: Looking for players to play norms today

replies.body:
do not add this person to play with he/she is very toxic and harrasses the team after he couldnt handle a little bit of banter thrown around by another team mate, he decided to not leash them and then starts being quite negative, i then informed them that i will be removing them due to being negative due to im not wanting that on my friends list to which they responded using highly abusive word.

idk about you i dont really want negative, abusive people on my friends list, i have screen shots of the chat if you want proof xx
